greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Restricted growth sequence transform of A304760(n), formed from 1-digits in ternary representation of A254103(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: A289813(n) = { my (d=digits(n, 3)); from digits(vector(#d, i, if (d[i]==1, 1, 0)), 2); } \\ From A289813

rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 29 2018
